pictures.picture: London Stereoscopic & Photographic Company: Algernon Charles Swinburne, ca. 1865, fotografi, 94mm x 62mm. National Portrait Gallery, London.
John McLanachan (fotograf) for Elliott & Fry: Algernon Charles Swinburne, ca. 1894, fotografi, 148mm x 105mm. National Portrait Gallery, London.
